title: New York City Trail Festival & Greenbelt Trail Ultra 50K
desc: Join King of the Mountain Events and the Greenbelt Conservancy for the 4th Annual NYC Trail Festival! There will be a  ,  and for the hearty -   - all in the beautiful Staten Island Greenbelt.  There will be mulitple aid stations for the 25 and 50K. The aid stations will have water, coke and a sports drink as well as snacks. Several of the aid stations will have restroom facilities. There are several street crossings, some of which will be manned by volunteers, however, it will be the runners ultimate responsiblity to ensure a safe crossing. 08:00 am for?50K 09:00 am for 25K 10:00am for 10K 50K runners must have head lamp or flashlight for second loop. Cut Off Time will be 3pm at Nature Center? mile 24. ?Course Maps (Will be posted in the Fall) 25/50K Brownies, MM's Fruit and PB and Jelly Water, Sports Drink and Coke First Aid Supplies/ Chip Timing There will be chip timing and numbers must be worn on the front of your shirt, shorts or tights. Here is some helpful information for you..  25 K roughly 1500 feet of elevation gain.  There will be 3 fully stocked aid stations at miles 3, 6, and 12. There will be water at a check point at mile 10. 50 K roughly 3100 feet of elevation gain with 7 fully stocked aid stations at miles 3, 6, 9, 16, 19, 22, 29 and water at two check points miles 13 and 26. Aid stations will have cliff bars, water, electrolytes, brownies, and other snacks. All racers will be required to have a headlamp only those leaving check point at mile 19 (main staging area) 1pm will be required to carry it. More updates to follow.
